Text: It would be nice if you could list the details of this release here or make an nfo we can dl. A program like GSpot (http://www.headbands.com/gspot) or MediaInfo (http://mediainfo.sourceforge.net) can give you the files audio and video information.

Thank you, jimhi. 
Carlovr69, your comment is wrong. The audio is dual track, #1 = English and plays in WMP, #2 = French stereo can be chosen in other players.
